MPI-Met: The ocean-sea ice component of the MPI-ESM. MPIOM is a primitive equation model (C-Grid, z-coordinates, free surface) with the hydrostatic and Boussinesq assumptions made.
Till Maier-Reimer, Helmuth Haak, Johann Jungclaus
`The Max-Planck-Institute global ocean/sea ice model with orthogonal curvilinear coordinates <https://doi.org/10.1016/S1463-5003(02)00015-X>`_
